December 19, 2024:  The Andromeda Galaxy is high in the southern sky as twilight ends.  Before sunrise look for the moon near the Sickle of Leo.
by Jeffrey L. Hunt
Chicago, Illinois: Sunrise, 7:14 … [+4770 chars]
